name: UFX Project
description: UFX Project is an AI-powered platform dedicated to analyzing Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) and building the worldâ€™s first blockchain-verified UAP database. The system combines advanced AI agents, science-fiction narrative analysis, and on-chain verification on the Base network to uncover patterns and correlations invisible to traditional research. The platform features over 100,000 documented sightings, an interactive global map with advanced filtering, 24/7 sky camera feeds, and a community-driven submission system where every report is timestamped on-chain for transparency. The native token, $UFX, unlocks premium AI tools, governance rights, staking rewards, research incentives, and exclusive features for holders. UFX aims to democratize access to UAP research and provide an immutable, transparent, and globally accessible knowledge base.
